categories: Category:Events of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Mapuzo break-in was an event that occurred on Mapuzo as of 2 ABY. The Task Force on Alliance Security believed that Rodian bounty hunter Vadon Lenitor had been present during the events that led to the Mapuzo break-in. Thus, they wanted to find Lenitor and interrogate her, although she was not considered as a wanted fugitive.
